name: Death Carnival
storyline: Welcome to Death Carnival, the fast-paced top-down parkour shooter. Insane assortment of weapons & characters, and a controller-smashing experience that will leave you hungry for more. Play story campaign solo, co-op with friends, or destroy everyone in PvP. Cross-platform and packed with spectator and party modes so the fun never ends. Choose from over a dozen characters each with unique attacks and story campaigns.
